items.title: TESE, TESA
items.description: These are all various methods to extract sperms in the testis in patients with azoospermia.

sections.title: TESE: Testicular sperm extraction
sections.description: • It involves a surgical biopsy of the testis to obtain sperm.

sections.title: TESA: Testicular sperm aspiration
sections.description:
• It is a procedure performed by inserting a needle in the testis and aspirating fluid and tissue with negative pressure.
  • Both are performed in men with azoospermia to obtain sperm which is then used for ICSI
